Flagstaff.KLJX-LP: KLJX-LP ("KJACK", 107.1 FM) is a student-run college radio station serving the Northern Arizona University campus in Flagstaff, Arizona, United States. The station broadcasts a variety of music in a freeform format, as well as campus and high school sports coverage. The station operates out of the NAU School of Communication on the school's Flagstaff campus.
